1: Move B1, B2 and B4 into SA3
2: Move B1 into SA3 then reverse back to sit near the bottom of the arena
3: Push B4 into SA1 (the red special area)
4: Push B2 into SA2 then reverse back to be near SA3
5: Move B1 into SA3 then reverse back out of SA3
6: Move B1 and B2 into SA3 then reverse back out of SA3
7: Push B2, B5 and B1 into SA2
8: Push B2 into SA1, then reverse back towards SA2
9: Push B1 and B3 into SA1
